G4-8 Markets served.Together with our wholly-owned regional airline 
subsidiaries and third-party regional carriers operating 
as American Eagle, our airline operates an average of 
nearly 6,700 flights per day to nearly 350 destinations 
in more than 50 countries. In 2015, approximately 
201 million passengers boarded our mainline and 
regional flights. As of December 31, 2015, we oper -
ated 946 mainline aircraft and are supported by our 
regional airline subsidiaries and third-party regional 
carriers, which operated an additional 587 regional 
aircraft. American is a founding member of the one -
world alliance, whose members and members-elect 
serve nearly 1,000 destinations with 14,250 daily 
flights to 150 countries. Our cargo division provides a 
wide range of freight and mail services, with facilities 
and interline connections available across the globe.
